name: Space Turret Attackers
description:
(Not Final Build)

Defend your ship using your turret! Use the upgrade shop to better your turrets stats to be able to destroy the harder enemies!

Play it in your browser: https://zojmedia.com/sta/

The Enemies:

  - The Ghost  Attack: 10 Health: 50

- The Sneeker Attack: 8 Health: 120 (Much faster than others, hard to see)  - The Bullet Attack: 25 Health: 250 (Slow)

- The Shadow Attack: 250 Health: 800 (Boss, spawns once per minute, wont spawn till the player has survived the first 60 seconds,  slow but can destroy your ship)
